p: The Programme of Health Protection of Citizens against Infectious Diseases determines the rubella prevention strategy in the Republic of Serbia. The goals of the programme are: maintaining a high level of coverage (>95%) with two doses of the MMR vaccine, supplemental immunization of the rubella-sensitive population, and the establishment and maintenance of the surveillance system with the aim of reducing the rate of congenital rubella syndrome to 0.01 per 1000 of live-born children [ 8, 9].
